meanings.definition: A traditional Mexican soup or stew made with hominy, meat, and spices.
meanings.sent1: My grandma makes the best posole for our family gatherings.
meanings.sent2: I ordered a bowl of posole at the Mexican restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The posole was so delicious that I asked for seconds.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of posole filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The warm posole warmed my soul on a cold winter day.

meanings.definition: Dried corn kernels that have been treated with an alkali solution to remove the hulls.
meanings.sent1: The store sells posole for making traditional dishes.
meanings.sent2: I bought a bag of posole to use in my recipe.
meanings.sent3: The posole looked like tiny, dried pearls in the package.
meanings.sent4: The posole popped like little fireworks when I cooked them.
meanings.sent5: The smell of cooking posole brought back memories of my childhood.
